hooks.command: changes=$(git diff --name-only 2>/dev/null; git diff --name-only --cached 2>/dev/null); if echo "$changes" | grep -qE '(pollen\.rkt|template.*\.html|index\.ptree|styles\.css\.pp)' && ! echo "$changes" | grep -q 'CLAUDE.md'; then echo 'Project structure files were modified but CLAUDE.md was not updated. Please review and update CLAUDE.md to reflect any changes to tags, templates, fonts, project structure, or metadata.'; exit 1; fi; exit 0
